subject: Re: JWebUnit with Mockobject
msgSnippet: ... Thanks Russell, thats what I need, I will give it a try.
messageBody:
> >
> > Just want to check if anyone know there is mockobject that
> > can be used with JWebUnit to simulate the webserver,
> > or it that possible at all ?
>
> HttpUnit (used by JWebUnit) provides two alternatives, depending on
> what you are trying to do. If you are developing servlets, ServletUnit
> allows you to build them test first without a servlet container. If
> you are focusing on web client development, PseudoServer can simulate
> a webserver, returning predefined responses. The unit tests included
> with HttpUnit demonstrate both.

Thanks Russell, thats what I need, I will give it a try.
